title: Representing the Type ID Board in Brighton
content:
I always wanted to have a T-shirt like that. So I designed one. Check it. ;^)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016234843im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Transatlantic_crew_5849.jpg)
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content: And in the spirit of the venture, I must ID the type: [Clarendon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016234843/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=clarendon&sample_text=a&sample_size=96) and [Katarine](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016234843/http:/suitcasetype.com/page.php?lmut=en&section=font&font=katarine).
